description: Erection of a mansard roof extension incorporating front and rear dormers, raising of chimneys and alterations existing outrigger roof to flat B
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the approved plans listed in this notice.Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning from the date of this decision notice.Reason: To comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 and Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

All new external work and finishes and work of making good shall match existing original work adjacent in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance except where indicated otherwise on the drawings hereby approved, or unless otherwise required by condition.Reason: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory in compliance with policies Q5, Q8 and Q11 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2015).

4	Unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority, the construction of the mansard roof shall accord with the following detailed requirements and be permanently retained as such thereafter:-	The decorative parapet elements on the front elevation shall be retained in their entirety -           The roof of the shall be finished in natural slates, with a lead flashing at the junction of the two slopes-	Party walls shall be raised in brick following the profile of the roof, and coped with bricks on edge-	Adequate space should be provided behind parapets for parapet gutters. -	Where parapet copings are required, they should have single surface sloping into the parapet gutter. Saddle copings, lead capping or paving slabs etc. are not acceptable. The decorative parapet elements on the front elevation shall be retained in their entirety.Reason: To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory in compliance with policies Q5, Q8 and Q11 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2015).

The hereby approved flat roof over the rear projection shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.   (Reason: To safeguard the amenities of neighbouring residential properties.(Policy Q2 of the Local Plan 2015)
